trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bangor

divs: Sighting DetailsGlowing object observed from window TV froze for next hr I am a seasoned investigator for the past 15 yrs object hovered then continued on out of my site slowly at first thought it was a explainable event aka helicopter. But then took notice whole object glowed not just a light and no sounds.
